Hello and Sawasdee ka!
My name is Newz and a recent graduate in Statistics. Currently based in Auckland, New Zealand.





Events - Coordinator/ Management Trainee | Shangri-La Hotel, Chiang Mai, Thailand. (2018 - 2020)
After Scool Elementary School Teacher | Hapdo Elementary, Dangjin, South Korea (2015 - 2017)





Graduate Diploma in Arts - Statistics, University of Auckland, New Zealand. (2022 - 2023)
Graduate Diploa in Business Studies, Massey University, New Zealand. (2018 - 2022)
Bachelor of Science - Biomedical Science, University of Auckland, New Zealand. (2012 - 2015)
